name: Wild Catch
description:
A really fun game where you catch and juggle crazy stuff falling from the sky!

Downloadable Android Game

This game is a mobile tapper where you have to keep things from falling to the ground. The game becomes harder every second while more and more things keep appearing on your screen. Download it now and reach for the highest score with your friends.

Features:

  • Wide variety of characters and objects
  • Multiple unlockable skins
  • Sweet and catchy in-game music
  • Show off your highest score in your social media!
ANDROID BETA NOW READY FOR DOWNLOAD!

Download now and comment your feedback below!
